title: I can't create new Item sets
body:
I can't click items and drag them into the item set blocks. Is this a bug or is it just me?

This bug has been going on for a couple of days now...

replies.body:
There are a handful of potential causes for this issue, but a repair is a good place to start, as *Deep Terror Nami* has suggested. If the client is trying to access assets in the League directory that are missing or corrupted, it could prevent you from interacting and creating the item set. 

If you continue to have issues after repairing your client, please let me know.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=hZTWw4tc,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-31T23:09:08.589+0000)
>
> There are a handful of potential causes for this issue, but a repair is a good place to start, as *Deep Terror Nami* has suggested. If the client is trying to access assets in the League directory that are missing or corrupted, it could prevent you from interacting and creating the item set. 
> 
> If you continue to have issues after repairing your client, please let me know.

Thank you! I'll try this!

Have you tried performing a client repair? This solves a lot of client issues, and you can start it by clicking the question mark on the top right of your launcher, or through the [Hextech Repair Tool found here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs).

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=hZTWw4tc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-31T19:36:44.000+0000)
>
> Have you tried performing a client repair? This solves a lot of client issues, and you can start it by clicking the question mark on the top right of your launcher, or through the [Hextech Repair Tool found here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs).

Thank you! I'll try this.
